title: Font ID help!
content:
Hello!  
I was wondering if anyone can help me figure out this font?

Thank you,  
Hala

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419121851im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Decal%20Repair_5894.jpg)

Font: 

 ITC Souvenir 

Solved By: 

 [PublishingMojo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419121851/http:/typophile.com/user/41133 "View user profile.")
author: Primehunter

comments.content: It's the Comic Sans of the 70s and 80s, ITC Souvenir.
